Jenny Rakotomamonjy (amụrụ n'afọ 1979), nke a maara site na aha edemede Jenny, bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Madagascar
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Chibimag comics studio.
A mụrụ Jenny Rakotomamonjy na Antananarivo, Madagascar, n'afọ 1979

Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ya na ndị mụrụ ya hapụrụ agwaetiti ahụ wee kwaga na mpaghara Paris. Ọ gụrụ nka na Mahadum Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne's Saint-Charles Center, wee sonye n'asọmpi mmemme afọ abụọ na Gobelins, l'École de l'image

N'afọ 2002, Jenny, onye na-eji naanị aha mbụ ya bịanye aka n'ọrụ ya, mepụtara obere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Le Papillon, ya na Antoine Antin. A họọrọ mkpirikpi ahụ maka ihe nrite Canal J Prize na Annecy International Animation Film Festival nke afọ ahụ. N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Marathon Animation were ya n'ọrụ ịrụ ọrụ na nhazi agwa maka usoro Martin Mystery na akụkọ maka Totally Spies!

Jenny wepụtara ihe ọchị mbụ ya, ụdị Pink Diary, na 2005. Usoro Pink Diary, nke Delcourt bipụtara na France, meriri ihe nrite 2006 maka Best Manga-Style Bande Dessinée site na magazin French Animeland. Ọ gara n'ihu ruo n'afọ 2008, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Jenny malitere usoro ọhụrụ, Mathilde, nke Sara et les Contes perdus sochiri. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na usoro Patricia Lyfoung's La Rose écarlate
N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọkwara onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Chibimag comics studio, nke o jikọtara aka na akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị dị iche iche.
Jenny bi na Eure-et-Loir, France, ebe ya na di ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro, onye na-emepụta ihe ọchị Alexis Coridun.
